title: Apple patent describes iPad keyboard accessory that triggers macOS-like UI
content:
Various rumors on Apple releasing an MacBook/iPad hybrid have been circling for a while. Today, the US Patent and Trademark Office has granted another new patent for Apple that raises new suspicion. According to Patently Apple, this new patent involves a hinged iPad keyboard accessory with an iPad using a macOS-like interface.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple patent describes iPad keyboard accessory that triggers macOS-like UI appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: According to Patently Apple, this new patent involves a hinged iPad keyboard accessory with multiple installation modes.
